name: OfOne
headline: AI-powered order taker for restaurant drive-thrus
description:
OfOne is building software to automate order taking at fast-food drive-thrus. Using conversational AI, we help restaurant chains operate more efficiently and level-up their customer experience.

OfOne can answer questions, intelligently upsell - like suggesting ice cream on a hot day - and always says please and thank you.

There are 200,000 drive-thrus in the US and they are the industry's largest order channel.

Our mission is to deliver human centric experiences that help restaurant operators prosper, deliver delight for their customers, and empower their workers.

founders.name: Will Edwards, Founder
founders.description:
Previously VP, Revenue @ Crew, a frontline employee communications app. I was the first business hire and helped scale Crew from 0 to 1M+ users and millions in ARR before being acquired by Square in 2021.

Before Crew, I worked on the Corporate Development team at Intuit where I focused on M&A and venture investments.

founders.name: Adam Proschek, Founder
founders.description:
Previously led product and engineering @ Crew, a frontline-employee communications app. I helped scale Crew from 0 to 1M+ users and millions in ARR before being acquired by Square in 2021.

Before Crew, I was an iOS engineer at Hotel Tonight (acquired by Airbnb).

# Supercharge your largest sales channel
AI Order Automation for Drive-thru Restaurants.
[Book a demo](https://www.of.one/<https:/www.of.one/contact>)
Watch video
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66b24dd441ecaab34a5ae8be/66b2cf0f1951e3fe3b342625_hero%20glow.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66b24dd441ecaab34a5ae8be/66b2ce6c455d6e84fc9b271e_hero%20imgae.png)
## Give customers what they want
### Speed
28%
Faster Ordering Times
### Accuracy
93%
AI Order Automation
### Convenience
95%
Customer Satisfaction
## Level up your Store Performance
### Streamlined Labor
Deliver more efficiency with automaton from greeting to order execution.
### Better Customer Experience
Ensure consistency & politeness across stores for an engaging brand experience.
### Faster Ordering
Minimize conversational turns and reduce ordering time at the speaker post.
### Personalized Upselling
Smoothly offer the right items at the right times to boost check-size the right way.
### Higher Order Accuracy
No more fuzzy comms. Ensure accurate, shared understanding of orders.
### More Loyal Customers
Increase loyalty signups & redemptions. Our agent never forgets to ask.
## Enterprise Grade Privacy & Security
### Administrative Controls
Fine-grained control over access and features.
### SOC 2 Type 2 Compliance
Your data stays secure, available, and confidential.
### Advanced Security Protocols
Data encryption at rest (AES-256) and in transit (TLS 1.2+).
### Comprehensive User Analytics
Insights into user adoption, engagement, and behavior.
## Integrated with Existing Restaurant Systems
### POS
Automated order execution and menu syncing.
### Loyalty
Seamless loyalty enrollment and offer redemption.
### Online Ordering
Seamless order ahead and 3rd party delivery pickup.
### Drive-thru Audio
Integrated with vehicle detector and employee headsets.
### KDS
Enable faster, more accurate food preparation.
## Learn how OfOne can transform your brand!

generated_description:
OfOne is a forward-thinking company that aims to reshape the fast-food industry through AI-powered order automation, specifically for drive-thrus. Founded in 2022 and part of Y Combinator's Batch W23, OfOne’s mission is straightforward: improve efficiency in restaurant operations while enhancing customer experiences. They achieve this through conversational AI that can not only take orders but also intelligently upsell items in a polite manner—think suggesting ice cream on a hot day while always remembering to say "please" and "thank you."

With over 200,000 drive-thrus in the U.S. being the largest order channel in the restaurant industry, the opportunity for streamlining processes is significant. OfOne's technology focuses on several key aspects: speeding up order times, increasing order accuracy, and providing a more personalized experience for customers. This is achieved by minimizing the back-and-forth during the ordering process and ensuring that every interaction feels human-centric.

The company, based in San Francisco and currently employing five people, prioritizes not just customer satisfaction (which they boast at 95% convenience) but also the privacy and security of the data it handles. They are SOC 2 Type 2 compliant, employing advanced encryption techniques for data protection.

OfOne integrates seamlessly with existing restaurant systems, from POS systems to online ordering platforms, ensuring that the shift to automation enhances rather than disrupts operations. This integration allows for a cohesive experience where orders are executed efficiently, loyalty programs are seamlessly managed, and food preparation can be expedited—all while keeping customers engaged and satisfied.

In a nutshell, OfOne is all about supercharging the drive-thru experience—using AI to transform an everyday transaction into a streamlined, delightful encounter. Dive deeper into their offering at [OfOne's website](https://www.of.one).
